title: Not starting?
body: Every time I open the game it instantly comes up with PVP.net Patcher Kernel has stopped working and I have haven't a clue why.

replies.body: None of that worked, bugger this game man.

Can I get you to run the [Hextech Toolkit](https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/player-support/tools/HTK_Setup.msi) (As administrator) with the following options selected.

http://puu.sh/nkGlw/95503fdd28.jpg

Please send a copy of the task report and the logs that were generated (Automatically saved on your desktop as LoL-Logs.zip) to the following email.

>oce-wrenchmen@googlegroups.com

Hey there,

Could you try the following and let me know if anything helps.

* Restart your computer, then restart the patcher process and let it sit.
* Go to your Riot Games/RADS/System folder under your default install path, right click and run the rads_user_kernel.exe file and run as Admin.
* Try deleting your LoL_Air_Client folder (the default install path for this folder is C:\Riot Games\RADS\Projects) and then repatching.
* See [this](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq5) article, about changing to a public DNS.
* Hit the Windows button and in the search bar type "cmd" and hit "OK". In the new window, type
* netsh winsock reset
* then hit enter and restart your computer.
* Replace /RADS/system/rads_user_kernel.exe, with [this file](http://l3cdn.riotgames.com/releases/live/system/rads_user_kernel.exe)
* Try installing [Microsoft Dot NET Framework 4.0](http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=17851) and [Dot NET 3.5](http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=21)
